AD_TauntPlayer.synopsis: Viconia taunting at the player in her combat during her turns.

AD_TauntPlayer_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_TauntPlayer_0.text: I am Lady Shar's instrument. You cannot win.
AD_TauntPlayer_0.context: NodeContext: Taunt directed at the player during combat.

AD_TauntPlayer_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_TauntPlayer_1.text: Fighting is futile - the darkness awaits you.
AD_TauntPlayer_1.context: NodeContext: Taunt directed at the player during combat.

AD_TauntPlayer_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_TauntPlayer_2.text: Lady Shar guides me. Your end is near.
AD_TauntPlayer_2.context: NodeContext: Taunt directed at the player during combat.

AD_TauntPlayer_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
AD_TauntPlayer_3.text: You shall never see sunlight again.
AD_TauntPlayer_3.context: NodeContext: Taunt directed at the player during combat.
